knimeNode.name: Keras Activation Layer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies an activation function to an output.

fullDescription.intro: This layer applies an activation function element-wise to the layer input. Corresponds to the Keras Activation Layer.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add an Activation layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Activation layer.
